trans-unit.source: Defines constants that provide strings or objects that are useful for XAML markup or for programming with XAML types.
trans-unit.target: 定義常數，這些常數提供對 XAML 標記或 XAML 型別程式設計很有用的字串或物件。

trans-unit.source: These strings or objects are relevant to XAML language concepts, to the implementation of XAML language concepts in .NET Framework XAML Services, or to both.
trans-unit.target: 這些字串或物件與 XAML 語言概念有關、與 .NET Framework XAML 服務中實作的 XAML 語言概念有關，或與兩者都有關。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xaml.XamlLanguage> API returns lookup results that are based on a XAML schema context that remains internal.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlLanguage> API 會傳回維持為內部 XAML 結構描述內容為基礎的查詢結果。

trans-unit.source: In this schema context, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.SupportMarkupExtensionsWithDuplicateArity%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在此結構描述內容中<xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.SupportMarkupExtensionsWithDuplicateArity%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the XAML schema context that is reported as the default for .NET Framework XAML Services and its defined XAML readers and XAML writers uses default settings.
trans-unit.target: 否則，XAML 結構描述內容報告為預設的.NET Framework XAML 服務及其定義的 XAML 讀取器和 XAML 寫入器會使用預設設定。

trans-unit.source: Overall, the XAML schema context that is used for predefined XAML readers and XAML writers is based on the same <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext> instance that is available from APIs that set or return a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext>.
trans-unit.target: 整體來說，使用預先定義的 XAML 讀取器和 XAML 寫入器的 XAML 結構描述內容根據相同<xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext>可從應用程式開發介面的設定或傳回的執行個體<xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext>。

trans-unit.source: The default XAML schema context for .NET Framework XAML Services is based on CLR concepts and reflection.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework XAML 服務的預設 XAML 結構描述內容為基礎 CLR 概念 」 和 「 反映。

trans-unit.source: Evidence of the default CLR backing can be found when obtaining certain <xref:System.Xaml.XamlLanguage> properties that are a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> and when checking <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 預設 CLR 支援的辨識項可以找到時取得特定<xref:System.Xaml.XamlLanguage>屬性都<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>和檢查時<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType.UnderlyingType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlLanguage> properties that are a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember> have CLR reflection-based values for <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.UnderlyingMember%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，<xref:System.Xaml.XamlLanguage>屬性都<xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember>有 CLR 反映型的值<xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.UnderlyingMember%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only generic collection of each <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> identifier that is defined by .NET Framework XAML Services.
trans-unit.target: 取得 .NET Framework XAML 服務所定義之各個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> 識別項的唯讀泛型集合。

trans-unit.source: A read-only generic collection of each <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> identifier that is defined by .NET Framework XAML Services.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework XAML 服務所定義之各個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> 識別項的唯讀泛型集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only generic collection of individual <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> values that match, or alias, a XAML language intrinsic that is defined by .NET Framework XAML Services.
trans-unit.target: 取得個別 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 值的唯讀泛型集合，這些值符合或別名化由 .NET Framework XAML 服務定義的 XAML 語言本質。

trans-unit.source: A read-only generic collection of each <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> that matches a XAML language intrinsic.
trans-unit.target: 符合 XAML 語言本質之各個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> 的唯讀泛型集合。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525) for a list of intrinsic XAML language information items.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.2](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)的內建 XAML 語言的資訊項目清單。

trans-unit.source: Note that not all items that are listed as subsections of 5.2 are implemented as a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，並非所有的項目列為 5.2 的各小節會實作為<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>。

trans-unit.source: For example, `x:Code` is not a type.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`x:Code`不是型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="Arguments" /> of a factory method or a generic usage.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> 做為 Factory 方法的 <see langword="Arguments" /> 或用於一般用途。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="Arguments" /> of a factory method or generic usage.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />，做為 Factory 方法的 <see langword="Arguments" /> 或用於一般用途。

trans-unit.source: A factory method is a [!INCLUDE[xaml2009](~/includes/xaml2009-md.md)] feature for identifying an alternative technique that constructs the underlying type for a XAML type.
trans-unit.target: Factory 方法，是[!INCLUDE[xaml2009](~/includes/xaml2009-md.md)]來識別替代方法來建構將 XAML 類型的基礎類型的功能。

trans-unit.source: The `Arguments` specify the input of a factory method and enable specifying that information in markup.
trans-unit.target: `Arguments`指定輸入的 factory 方法，並啟用在標記中指定該資訊。

trans-unit.source: The default techniques, in absence of a factory method, are to attempt to find a default constructor and then attempt to find an identified type converter for type, member, or destination type.
trans-unit.target: 不存在的 factory 方法，文中的預設技術是要嘗試尋找預設的建構函式，並嘗試尋找類型、 成員或目的類型識別的型別轉換子。

trans-unit.source: For the generic usage, the `Arguments` wrap the objects or initialization text of all construction inputs that are specified as necessary for the `TypeArguments`.
trans-unit.target: 對於一般的使用方式，`Arguments`包裝的物件或指定為所需的所有建構輸入初始化文字`TypeArguments`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="Array" /> XAML language intrinsic.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see langword="Array" /> XAML 語言本質的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="Array" /> XAML language intrinsic.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Array" /> XAML 語言本質的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.18](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.2.18](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="AsyncRecords" /> pseudomember.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see langword="AsyncRecords" /> 虛擬成員的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="AsyncRecords" /> pseudomember.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="AsyncRecords" /> 虛擬成員的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: The `AsyncRecords` concept is part of [!INCLUDE[xaml2009](~/includes/xaml2009-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: `AsyncRecords`概念是一部分[!INCLUDE[xaml2009](~/includes/xaml2009-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: See [XAML 2009 Language Features](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xaml-2009-language-features.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[XAML 2009 語言功能](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xaml-2009-language-features.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="base" /> directive from XML.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XML 中之 <see langword="base" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="base" /> directive from XML.
trans-unit.target: XML 中之 <see langword="base" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.15](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.3.15](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.target: 取得 <see langword="Char" /> XAML 語言本質的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="Char" /> XAML language intrinsic.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Char" /> XAML 語言本質的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.7](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段第 5.2.7](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="Class" /> directive from XAML.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XAML 中之 <see langword="Class" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="Class" /> directive from XAML.
trans-unit.target: XAML 中之 <see langword="Class" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.7](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.3.7](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="ClassAttributes" /> directive from XAML.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XAML 中之 <see langword="ClassAttributes" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="ClassAttributes" /> directive from XAML.
trans-unit.target: XAML 中之 <see langword="ClassAttributes" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: This directive is part of [!INCLUDE[xaml2009](~/includes/xaml2009-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這個指示詞是一部分[!INCLUDE[xaml2009](~/includes/xaml2009-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: See [XAML 2009 Language Features](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xaml-2009-language-features.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[XAML 2009 語言功能](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xaml-2009-language-features.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="ClassModifier" /> directive from XAML.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XAML 中之 <see langword="ClassModifier" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="ClassModifier" /> directive from XAML.
trans-unit.target: XAML 中之 <see langword="ClassModifier" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.9](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.3.9](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for <see langword="Code" /> as detailed in [MS-XAML].
trans-unit.target: 取得 [MS-XAML] 中所述之 <see langword="Code" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for <see langword="Code" /> as detailed in [MS-XAML].
trans-unit.target: [MS-XAML] 中所述之 <see langword="Code" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.22](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525), where `Code` is indicated as a type; however, `Code` is provided as a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective> by this API.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.2.22](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)，其中`Code`指示做為類型; 不過，`Code`依現狀<xref:System.Xaml.XamlDirective>由這個 API。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> that identifies a connection point for wiring events to handlers.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />，以識別將事件傳送至處理常式的連接點。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> that identifies a connection point for wiring events to handlers.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />，識別將事件傳送至處理常式的連接點。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="Decimal" /> XAML language intrinsic.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see langword="Decimal" /> XAML 語言本質的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="Decimal" /> XAML language intrinsic.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Decimal" /> XAML 語言本質的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.14](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段第 5.2.14](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="Double" /> XAML language intrinsic.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see langword="Double" /> XAML 語言本質的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="Double" /> XAML language intrinsic.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Double" /> XAML 語言本質的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.9](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段第 5.2.9](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> that identifies a factory method for XAML.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />，以識別 XAML 的 Factory 方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> that identifies a factory method for XAML.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />，識別 XAML 的 Factory 方法。

trans-unit.source: A factory method is a [!INCLUDE[xaml2009](~/includes/xaml2009-md.md)] feature for identifying an alternative technique that constructs the underlying type for a XAML type.
trans-unit.target: Factory 方法，是[!INCLUDE[xaml2009](~/includes/xaml2009-md.md)]來識別替代方法來建構將 XAML 類型的基礎類型的功能。

trans-unit.source: The default technique, if a factory method is unavailable, is to try to find a default constructor, and then try to find an identified type converter on type, member, or destination type.
trans-unit.target: 預設的技術，如果無法使用的 factory 方法，是嘗試尋找預設的建構函式，然後再嘗試尋找類型、 成員或目的型別上的已識別的型別轉換子。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="FieldModifier" /> directive from XAML.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XAML 中之 <see langword="FieldModifier" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="FieldModifier" /> directive from XAML.
trans-unit.target: XAML 中之 <see langword="FieldModifier" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.10](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.3.10](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="Initialization" /> directive from XAML.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XAML 中之 <see langword="Initialization" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="Initialization" /> directive from XAML.
trans-unit.target: XAML 中之 <see langword="Initialization" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: This directive represents the XAML node or XAML information set representation of initialization text, where a string within an object element supplies the type construction information for the surrounding object element.
trans-unit.target: 這個指示詞代表 XAML 節點或 XAML 資訊集的初始文字表示物件項目內的字串提供周圍的物件項目型別建構資訊的位置。

trans-unit.source: If you are looking at raw node interpretations or visualizations, `Initialization` is sometimes seen in string form as `_Initialization` (note the leading underscore) and is within the XAML language XAML namespace (as notated by a preceding `Namespace` node).
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在查看原始節點的解譯或視覺效果，`Initialization`有時候會出現在字串的形式`_Initialization`（請注意前置底線），且是在 XAML 語言 XAML 命名空間 (如表示前面`Namespace`節點)。

trans-unit.source: In [MS-XAML], this concept is described under the heading `x:InitializationText`.
trans-unit.target: 在 [MS-XAML]，這個概念描述標題底下`x:InitializationText`。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.3](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段版本低於 5.3.3](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="Int16" /> XAML language intrinsic.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see langword="Int16" /> XAML 語言本質的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="Int16" /> XAML language intrinsic.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Int16" /> XAML 語言本質的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.11](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段第 5.2.11](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段第 5.2.12](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.target: 取得 <see langword="Int64" /> XAML 語言本質的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="Int64" /> XAML language intrinsic.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Int64" /> XAML 語言本質的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.13](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段第 5.2.13](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="Items" /> directive from XAML.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XAML 中之 <see langword="Items" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="Items" /> directive from XAML.
trans-unit.target: XAML 中之 <see langword="Items" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: An `Items` directive is a node representation wrapper around multiple object values within a surrounding object.
trans-unit.target: `Items`指示詞是周圍的物件內的多個物件值的節點表示包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.1](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段第 5.3.1 章](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.source: If you examine raw XAML node stream interpretations or visualizations, `Items` is sometimes seen in string form as `_Items` (note the leading underscore) and is within the XAML language XAML namespace (as notated by a preceding `Namespace` node).
trans-unit.target: 如果您檢查未經處理的 XAML 節點資料流解譯或視覺效果，`Items`有時候會出現在字串的形式`_Items`（請注意前置底線），且是在 XAML 語言 XAML 命名空間 (如表示前面`Namespace`節點)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="Key" /> directive from XAML.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XAML 中之 <see langword="Key" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="Key" /> directive from XAML.
trans-unit.target: XAML 中之 <see langword="Key" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: A `Key` directive is used for objects in a dictionary.
trans-unit.target: A`Key`指示詞會用於字典中的物件。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.3.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="lang" /> directive from XML.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XML 中之 <see langword="lang" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="lang" /> directive from XML.
trans-unit.target: XML 中之 <see langword="lang" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.13](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.3.13](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the type that is the item type of <see cref="P:System.Xaml.XamlLanguage.Members" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得型別的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />，這個型別是 <see cref="P:System.Xaml.XamlLanguage.Members" /> 的項目型別。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the type that is the item type of <see cref="P:System.Xaml.XamlLanguage.Members" />.
trans-unit.target: 型別的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />，這個型別是 <see cref="P:System.Xaml.XamlLanguage.Members" /> 的項目型別。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework XAML Services implementation, the `Member` <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> is backed by <xref:System.Windows.Markup.MemberDefinition?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework XAML 服務實作中， `Member` <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>受到<xref:System.Windows.Markup.MemberDefinition?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="Members" /> concept in XAML.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XAML 中之 <see langword="Members" /> 概念的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="Members" /> concept in XAML.
trans-unit.target: XAML 中之 <see langword="Members" /> 概念的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: The `Members` concept is not specifically defined in [MS-XAML].
trans-unit.target: `Members` [MS-XAML] 中未明確定義概念。

trans-unit.source: `Members` is a concept for defining members of types in markup itself, as opposed to referencing backing types.
trans-unit.target: `Members` 是相對於參考支援類型本身，標記中定義的型別成員的概念。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Markup.PropertyDefinition>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Markup.PropertyDefinition>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="Name" /> directive from XAML.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XAML 中之 <see langword="Name" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="Name" /> directive from XAML.
trans-unit.target: XAML 中之 <see langword="Name" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: A `Name` directive is used for identifiers of objects in markup.
trans-unit.target: A`Name`指示詞用於標記中物件的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.4](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.3.4](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.source: Although this concept of `Name` is not completely consistent with the use that is specified in [MS-XAML], you can typically use the `Name` directive or the `Name` attribute to provide a conceptual connection between XAML objects in markup and the run-time representations that are created by XAML processing of the markup.
trans-unit.target: 雖然這個概念的`Name`不完全一致的使用中指定 [MS-XAML]，您通常可以使用`Name`指示詞或`Name`提供 XAML 標記中的物件之間的概念連接屬性XAML 所建立的執行階段表示和處理的標記。

trans-unit.source: This use depends on how specific frameworks implement their programming models to integrate XAML into their general object models.
trans-unit.target: 取決於此使用方式的特定架構上實作其將 XAML 整合到他們的一般物件模型的程式設計模型。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [x:Name Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[X:name 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="Null" /> or <see langword="NullExtension" /> XAML language intrinsic.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see langword="Null" /> 或 <see langword="NullExtension" /> XAML 語言本質的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="Null" />/<see langword="NullExtension" /> XAML language intrinsic.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />如<see langword="Null" /> / <see langword="NullExtension" /> XAML 語言內建函式。

trans-unit.source: This XAML type provides null values for object values in markup.
trans-unit.target: 此 XAML 類型提供 null 值的標記中的物件值。

trans-unit.source: The XAML type is (or must be) assignable to `MarkupExtension`.
trans-unit.target: XAML 型別是 （或必須） 指派給`MarkupExtension`。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.4](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.2.4](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="Object" /> XAML language concept.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see langword="Object" /> XAML 語言概念的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="Object" /> XAML language concept.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Object" /> XAML 語言概念的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: XAML specifies `x:Object` as a special language concept.
trans-unit.target: 指定 XAML`x:Object`特殊語言概念。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.2.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="PositionalParameters" /> directive from XAML.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XAML 中之 <see langword="PositionalParameters" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="PositionalParameters" /> directive from XAML.
trans-unit.target: XAML 中之 <see langword="PositionalParameters" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: `PositionalParameters` is a directive that wraps the multiple objects that can be specified as a set of object nodes for input of a markup extension.
trans-unit.target: `PositionalParameters` 已包裝可指定為一組輸入標記延伸的物件節點的多個物件的指示詞。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 6.6.7](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 6.6.7](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.source: If you are looking at raw node interpretations or visualizations, `PositionalParameters` is sometimes seen in string form as `_PositionalParameters` (note the leading underscore) and is within the XAML language XAML namespace (as notated by a preceding `Namespace` node).
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在查看原始節點的解譯或視覺效果，`PositionalParameters`有時候會出現在字串的形式`_PositionalParameters`（請注意前置底線），且是在 XAML 語言 XAML 命名空間 (如表示前面`Namespace`節點)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="Property" /> concept in XAML.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XAML 中之 <see langword="Property" /> 概念的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="Property" /> concept in XAML.
trans-unit.target: XAML 中之 <see langword="Property" /> 概念的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: `Property` is a specialized form of the XAML type that is identified as <xref:System.Xaml.XamlLanguage.Member%2A>.
trans-unit.target: `Property` 是一種特殊的形式的 XAML 型別會被識別為<xref:System.Xaml.XamlLanguage.Member%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> that represents a <see langword="Reference" /> for XAML.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示 XAML 之 <see langword="Reference" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> that represents a <see langword="Reference" /> for XAML.
trans-unit.target: 表示 XAML 之 <see langword="Reference" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: `Reference` is a [!INCLUDE[xaml2009](~/includes/xaml2009-md.md)] feature for referencing another object node in the markup.
trans-unit.target: `Reference` 是[!INCLUDE[xaml2009](~/includes/xaml2009-md.md)]來參考另一個物件節點，在標記中的功能。

trans-unit.source: The implementation for .NET Framework XAML Services is found in <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Reference?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework XAML 服務實作位於<xref:System.Windows.Markup.Reference?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="Shared" /> directive for XAML.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XAML 之 <see langword="Shared" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="Shared" /> directive for XAML.
trans-unit.target: XAML 之 <see langword="Shared" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: A `Shared` directive (when it is set to `true`) specifies that when an item is found in a dictionary, references to the object should always return the singleton instead of a new instance.
trans-unit.target: A`Shared`指示詞 (當設定為`true`) 指定字典中找到項目時，物件的參考應該永遠傳回單一物件，而不是的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This behavior is related to the concept that a dictionary might be used as a source for a shared content or template mechanism by particular frameworks that use XAML.
trans-unit.target: 此行為相關的概念，字典可能會用於做為來源的共用的內容或範本機制的特定使用 XAML 的架構。

trans-unit.source: `Shared` is not specified in [MS-XAML] but is part of the `x` namespace–defined behavior for XAML in WPF and .NET Framework version 3.0 and version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: `Shared` 未指定 [MS-XAML] 中，但屬於`x`WPF 和.NET Framework 中的 xaml 命名空間定義的行為版本 3.0 和 3.5 版。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="Single" /> XAML language intrinsic.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see langword="Single" /> XAML 語言本質的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="Single" /> XAML language intrinsic.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Single" /> XAML 語言本質的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.8](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段第 5.2.8](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="space" /> directive from XML.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XML 中之 <see langword="space" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="space" /> directive from XML.
trans-unit.target: XML 中之 <see langword="space" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.14](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.3.14](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="Static" />/<see langword="StaticExtension" /> XAML language intrinsic.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see langword="Static" />/<see langword="StaticExtension" /> XAML 語言本質的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="Static" />/<see langword="StaticExtension" /> XAML language intrinsic.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />如<see langword="Static" /> / <see langword="StaticExtension" /> XAML 語言內建函式。

trans-unit.source: This XAML type provides values for markup where the backing member is a static member.
trans-unit.target: 此 XAML 類型提供之支援成員所在的靜態成員的標記值。

trans-unit.source: The XAML type is (or must be) assignable to `MarkupExtension`.
trans-unit.target: XAML 型別是 （或必須） 指派給`MarkupExtension`。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.2](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.2.2 章](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="String" /> XAML language intrinsic.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see langword="String" /> XAML 語言本質的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="String" /> XAML language intrinsic.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" /> XAML 語言本質的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.6](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.2.6](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="Subclass" /> directive from XAML.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XAML 中之 <see langword="Subclass" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="Subclass" /> directive from XAML.
trans-unit.target: XAML 中之 <see langword="Subclass" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.8](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.3.8](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> that enables loading XAML asynchronously if the XAML processor supports such a mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得啟用非同步 XAML 載入模式的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> (如果 XAML 處理器支援這種模式的話)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> that enables loading XAML asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 啟用非同步 XAML 載入模式的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: A `SynchronousMode` directive (when set to `Async`) is used to specify that when a XAML file is loaded, the root node is processed first.
trans-unit.target: A`SynchronousMode`指示詞 (當設定為`Async`) 用來指定，當載入 XAML 檔案時，會先處理根節點。

trans-unit.source: The resulting object can be inserted even though its content is still processing.
trans-unit.target: 可以插入結果的物件，即使仍在處理其內容。

trans-unit.source: In this mode you can bypass the default XAML processing behavior of working from deepest node to the root.
trans-unit.target: 在此模式中，您可以略過工作最深的節點從根目錄的預設 XAML 處理行為。

trans-unit.source: In the default processing logic for XAML, any caller that is waiting for the root object is blocked until the full parse is complete.
trans-unit.target: 在預設的 xaml 處理邏輯，正在等候根物件的任何呼叫端會封鎖直到完成完整的剖析。

trans-unit.source: `SynchronousMode` is not specified in [MS-XAML] but is part of the `x` namespace–defined behavior for XAML in WPF beginning in .NET Framework version 3.5 with SP1 (or any subsequent service pack).
trans-unit.target: `SynchronousMode` 未指定 [MS-XAML] 中，但屬於`x`命名空間定義中的行為 xaml WPF 在.NET Framework 3.5 版 SP1 （或任何後續的 service pack） 中的開頭。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="TimeSpan" /> concept in XAML language.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XAML 語言中之 <see langword="TimeSpan" /> 概念的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="TimeSpan" /> XAML language concept.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="TimeSpan" /> XAML 語言概念的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.16](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段第 5.2.16](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.source: `TimeSpan` is not a true intrinsic, but was specified in the XAML specification because it is a commonly used type.
trans-unit.target: `TimeSpan` 不是 true，內建函式，但因為它是常用的類型，XAML 規格中已指定。

trans-unit.source: The XAML specification authors considered it useful to standardize the XAML representation in derived vocabularies.
trans-unit.target: XAML 規格作者視為有用標準化衍生詞彙中的 XAML 表示法。

trans-unit.source: See also [Built-in Types for Common XAML Language Primitives](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/built-in-types-for-common-xaml-language-primitives.md).
trans-unit.target: 另請參閱[通用 XAML 語言基本類型的類型內建](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/built-in-types-for-common-xaml-language-primitives.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="Type" />/<see langword="TypeExtension" /> XAML language intrinsic.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see langword="Type" />/<see langword="TypeExtension" /> XAML 語言本質的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="Type" />/<see langword="TypeExtension" /> XAML language intrinsic.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />如<see langword="Type" /> / <see langword="TypeExtension" /> XAML 語言內建函式。

trans-unit.source: This XAML type provides <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> values that use bindings from, and lookups to, a backing type system.
trans-unit.target: 這個 XAML 型別提供<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>使用來自，繫結的值和查閱，支援類型系統。

trans-unit.source: The XAML type is (or must be) assignable to `MarkupExtension`.
trans-unit.target: XAML 型別是 （或必須） 指派給`MarkupExtension`。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.3](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.2.3](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="TypeArguments" /> directive from XAML.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XAML 中之 <see langword="TypeArguments" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="TypeArguments" /> directive from XAML.
trans-unit.target: XAML 中之 <see langword="TypeArguments" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: A `TypeArguments` directive specifies the type constraints of a generic when a generic is specified as a XAML object.
trans-unit.target: A`TypeArguments`指示詞指定的泛型類型條件約束，一般會指定為 XAML 物件時。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.11](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.3.11](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="Uid" /> directive from XAML.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XAML 中之 <see langword="Uid" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="Uid" /> directive from XAML.
trans-unit.target: XAML 中之 <see langword="Uid" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: A `Uid` directive specifies a unique identifier for a XAML markup element.
trans-unit.target: A`Uid`指示詞指定的 XAML 標記元素的唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Strictly speaking, such a unique identifier could be applied to several purposes within a XAML-implementing framework.
trans-unit.target: 嚴格來說，這類的唯一識別碼無法套用至多種用途，在實作 XAML 的架構中。

trans-unit.source: `Uid` differs from `Name` in that `Name` has a specific role in the [MS-XAML] definition for declaring the identifiers that exist in an object graph output from a XAML source, whereas `Uid` has no specific role.
trans-unit.target: `Uid` 不同於`Name`在於`Name`具有特定角色中 [MS-XAML] 定義的宣告存在物件圖形輸出 XAML 來源中的識別項，而`Uid`有沒有特定的角色。

trans-unit.source: In the existing XAML-implementing frameworks that use .NET Framework XAML Services, `Uid` is typically used for localization purposes.
trans-unit.target: 在現有實作 XAML 的架構使用.NET Framework XAML 服務，`Uid`通常用於當地語系化的目的。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.3.6](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段 5.3.6](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="UnknownContent" /> directive from XAML.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XAML 中之 <see langword="UnknownContent" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" /> for the <see langword="UnknownContent" /> directive from XAML.
trans-unit.target: XAML 中之 <see langword="UnknownContent" /> 指示詞的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlDirective" />。

trans-unit.source: `UnknownContent` is a directive that is a placeholder to use in a XAML node set if a reader encounters unknown content for a value node or initialization text (no available intrinsic or text syntax can convert it).
trans-unit.target: `UnknownContent` 這是一個預留位置，在 XAML 節點集，如果讀取器遇到未知的內容值節點中使用的指示詞或初始文字 （沒有可用的內建函式或文字語法可以將它轉換）。

trans-unit.source: If you are looking at raw node interpretations or visualizations, `UnknownContent` is sometimes seen in string form as `_UnknownContent` (note the leading underscore) and is within the XAML language XAML namespace (as notated by a preceding `Namespace` node).
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在查看原始節點的解譯或視覺效果，`UnknownContent`有時候會出現在字串的形式`_UnknownContent`（請注意前置底線），且是在 XAML 語言 XAML 命名空間 (如表示前面`Namespace`節點)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="Uri" /> XAML language concept.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see langword="Uri" /> XAML 語言概念的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the <see langword="Uri" /> XAML language concept.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Uri" /> XAML 語言概念的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.15](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ [MS-XAML]區段第 5.2.15](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.source: `Uri` is not a true intrinsic but was specified in the XAML specification because it is a frequently used type.
trans-unit.target: `Uri` 不是 XAML 規格中指定，則為 true 的內建函式但因為它是常用的型別。

trans-unit.source: The XAML specification authors considered it useful to standardize the XAML representation in derived vocabularies.
trans-unit.target: XAML 規格作者視為有用標準化衍生詞彙中的 XAML 表示法。

trans-unit.source: See also [Built-in Types for Common XAML Language Primitives](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/built-in-types-for-common-xaml-language-primitives.md).
trans-unit.target: 另請參閱[通用 XAML 語言基本類型的類型內建](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/built-in-types-for-common-xaml-language-primitives.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string value for the string that identifies the XAML (2006) language namespace.
trans-unit.target: 取得字串的字串值，這個字串識別 XAML (2006) 語言命名空間。

trans-unit.source: That namespace corresponds to the XAML (2006) "x" prefixed namespace as defined in [[MS-XAML] Section 5.1.1](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 根據 [[MS-XAML] 第 5.1.1 節](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525) \(英文\) 中的定義，該命名空間對應至開頭為 XAML (2006) "x" 的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the namespace identifiers for XAML.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XAML 之命名空間識別項的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of the namespace identifiers for XAML.
trans-unit.target: XAML 之命名空間識別項的集合。

trans-unit.source: Currently this collection contains only the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlLanguage.Xaml2006Namespace> value.
trans-unit.target: 此集合目前僅包含<xref:System.Xaml.XamlLanguage.Xaml2006Namespace>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the XAML type that backs an <see langword="XData" /> block in XAML.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XAML 型別的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />，這個型別支援 XAML 中的 <see langword="XData" /> 區塊。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" /> for the XAML type that backs an <see langword="XData" /> block.
trans-unit.target: 支援 <see langword="XData" /> 區塊之 XAML 型別的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlType" />。

trans-unit.source: See [[MS-XAML] Section 5.2.23](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[[MS-XAML] 區段 5.2.23](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string value for the string that identifies the XML (1998) language namespace.
trans-unit.target: 取得字串的字串值，這個字串識別 XML (1998) 語言命名空間。

trans-unit.source: That namespace corresponds to the XML "xml" prefixed namespace as referenced in [[MS-XAML] Section 5.1.2](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525).
trans-unit.target: 根據 [[MS-XAML] 第 5.1.2 節](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=114525) \(英文\) 中的描述，該命名空間對應至開頭為 XML "xml" 的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the namespace identifiers for XML.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XML 之命名空間識別項的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of the namespace identifiers for XML.
trans-unit.target: XML 之命名空間識別項的集合。

trans-unit.source: Currently this collection contains only the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlLanguage.Xml1998Namespace> value.
trans-unit.target: 此集合目前僅包含<xref:System.Xaml.XamlLanguage.Xml1998Namespace>值。
